content: असित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Unbound (<ab>Ved.</ab>) {@--2@} [न सितः शुभ्रः] Not white, black, dark-blue, dark-coloured; असिता मोहरजनी <ls>Śānti. 3. 4</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 166</ls>; °लोचना, °नयना &c. --तः {@--1@} The dark or blue colour. {@--2@} The dark fortnight of a lunar month. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the planet Saturn. {@--4@} A black snake. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the sage देवल. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a being presiding over darkness and magic. --ता {@--1@} The Indigo plant. {@--2@} A girl attending upon the harem (whose hair is not whitened by age); see असिक्नी. {@--3@} The river Yamunā. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a daughter of Vīraṇa and wife of Dakṣa. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the river Akesines in the Punjab.
